languages.text: В тот день уцелело из них не больше сотни — Император был требователен к оступившимся. Но рьяности у них могли бы поучиться и многие бывалые вояки: измазанные маслом, кровью и копотью, с отчаянным фанатизмом во взглядах, штрафники умудрились прорваться к могучему крейсеру, несмотря на потери. Карабкаясь сквозь шахты, орудуя штыками и пользуясь своими скудными познаниями о священных технологиях, они уничтожили еретиков, управлявших макропушками, дав шанс ударным группам блюстителей высадиться на крейсер и зачистить его от оставшихся культистов. Крейсер был покорен.

No more than a hundred of them were left alive that day. The Emperor was harsh on those who had turned against Him. But many a seasoned soldier could have learned from their fervour. Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. They climbed shafts, used their bayonets, and applied what scant knowledge they had of sacred technology. Eventually, they destroyed the heretics operating the macro-cannons. Enforcer strike groups were then able to land on the cruiser and clean up the remaining cultists. The cruiser was conquered.
languages.original_text: В тот день уцелело из них не больше сотни — Император был требователен к оступившимся. Но рьяности у них могли бы поучиться и многие бывалые вояки: измазанные маслом, кровью и копотью, с отчаянным фанатизмом во взглядах, штрафники умудрились прорваться к могучему крейсеру, несмотря на потери. Карабкаясь сквозь шахты, орудуя штыками и пользуясь своими скудными познаниями о священных технологиях, они уничтожили еретиков, управлявших макропушками, дав шанс ударным группам блюстителей высадиться на крейсер и зачистить его от оставшихся культистов. Крейсер был покорен.

traits.locale_text: No more than a hundred of them were left alive that day. The Emperor was exacting on those who had misstepped. But many a seasoned soldier could have learned from their fervour. Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of a desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. They climbed shafts, used their bayonets, and applied what scant knowledge they had of sacred technology — and eventually destroyed the heretics who were operating the macro-cannons. Enforcer strike groups were then able to land on the cruiser and clean up the remaining cultists. The cruiser was conquered.

Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. Enforcer strike groups were then able to land on the cruiser and clean up the remaining cultists. The cruiser was conquered.

languages.text: 那场战斗结束之后，活下来的人不到一百人。尽管帝皇对背叛者非常严厉，但许多身经百战的士兵，都从那些赎罪者的热情之中学到了东西。尽管那些人浑身沾满了焦油、血渍和烟灰，但他们的目光中充满了一往无前的热忱。尽管他们遭受了惨重伤亡，但还是想办法冲进了那艘坚不可摧的巡洋舰里。他们爬上竖井，挥舞刺刀与敌人肉搏，运用他们有限的神圣技术知识与敌人战斗。到了最后，他们消灭了操纵宏炮的异端分子。在那之后，执法者也登上了巡洋舰，清理掉了剩余的邪教徒，重新夺回了巡洋舰。
languages.original_text: No more than a hundred of them were left alive that day. The Emperor was harsh on those who had turned against Him. But many a seasoned soldier could have learned from their fervour. Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. They climbed shafts, used their bayonets, and applied what scant knowledge they had of sacred technology. Eventually, they destroyed the heretics operating the macro-cannons. Enforcer strike groups were then able to land on the cruiser and clean up the remaining cultists. The cruiser was conquered.

traits.locale_text: 那场战斗结束之后，活下来的人不到一百人。尽管帝皇对犯错的人非常严厉，但许多身经百战的士兵，都从那些赎罪者的热情之中学到了东西。尽管那些人浑身沾满了焦油、血渍和烟灰，但他们的目光中充满了一往无前的热忱。尽管他们遭受了惨重伤亡，但还是想办法冲进了那艘坚不可摧的巡洋舰里。他们爬上竖井，挥舞刺刀与敌人肉搏，运用他们有限的神圣技术知识与敌人战斗。到了最后，他们消灭了操纵宏炮的异端分子。在那之后，执法者也登上了巡洋舰，清理掉了剩余的邪教徒，重新夺回了巡洋舰。

languages.text: Höchstens hundert waren an diesem Tag am Leben geblieben. Der Imperator war gnadenlos mit allen, die sich von ihm abgewandt hatten. Doch viele erfahrene Soldaten hätten von ihrem Eifer lernen können. Mit Öl, Blut und Ruß bedeckt und mit einem verzweifelten Eifer in den Augen gelang es den Kämpfern der Strafeinheit trotz ihrer Verluste irgendwie, zu dem mächtigen Kreuzer durchzubrechen. Sie kletterten Schächte hinauf, setzten ihre Bajonetts ein und nutzten ihr dürftiges Wissen über heilige Technologie. Schließlich vernichteten sie die Ketzer, die die Makrokanonen bedienten. Danach konnten Enforcer-Angriffstrupps auf dem Kreuzer landen und die übrigen Kultisten beseitigen. Der Kreuzer wurde erobert.
languages.original_text: No more than a hundred of them were left alive that day. The Emperor was harsh on those who had turned against Him. But many a seasoned soldier could have learned from their fervour. Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. They climbed shafts, used their bayonets, and applied what scant knowledge they had of sacred technology. Eventually, they destroyed the heretics operating the macro-cannons. Enforcer strike groups were then able to land on the cruiser and clean up the remaining cultists. The cruiser was conquered.

traits.locale_text: Höchstens hundert waren an diesem Tag am Leben geblieben. Der Imperator war gnadenlos mit allen, die vom Weg abgekommen waren. Doch viele erfahrene Soldaten hätten von ihrem Eifer lernen können. Mit Öl, Blut und Ruß bedeckt und mit einem verzweifelten Eifer in den Augen gelang es den Kämpfern der Strafeinheit trotz ihrer Verluste irgendwie, zu dem mächtigen Kreuzer durchzubrechen. Sie kletterten Schächte hinauf, setzten ihre Bajonetts ein und nutzten ihr dürftiges Wissen über heilige Technologie. Schließlich vernichteten sie die Ketzer, die die Makrokanonen bedienten. Danach konnten Enforcer-Angriffstrupps auf dem Kreuzer landen und die übrigen Kultisten beseitigen. Der Kreuzer wurde erobert.

languages.text: Aquel día no quedaron con vida más de un centenar; el Emperador castigó con severidad a quienes se habían rebelado contra Él. Pero su fervor podría servir de inspiración a los soldados veteranos. Cubiertos de aceite, sangre y hollín, con un fanatismo desesperado en su mirada, los combatientes de la unidad penal lograron de algún modo, y a pesar de sufrir numerosas bajas, irrumpir en el formidable crucero. Escalaron por huecos de elevadores, emplearon sus bayonetas y aplicaron sus escasos conocimientos sobre las sagradas tecnologías. Finalmente lograron eliminar a los herejes que operaban los macrocañones. Entonces los grupos de asalto pudieron abordar el crucero y neutralizar a los restantes sectarios. La nave había sido conquistada.
languages.original_text: No more than a hundred of them were left alive that day. The Emperor was harsh on those who had turned against Him. But many a seasoned soldier could have learned from their fervour. Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. They climbed shafts, used their bayonets, and applied what scant knowledge they had of sacred technology. Eventually, they destroyed the heretics operating the macro-cannons. Enforcer strike groups were then able to land on the cruiser and clean up the remaining cultists. The cruiser was conquered.

traits.locale_text: Aquel día no quedaron con vida más de un centenar; el Emperador castigó los errores con severidad. Pero su fervor podría servir de inspiración a los soldados veteranos. Cubiertos de aceite, sangre y hollín, con un fanatismo desesperado en su mirada, los combatientes de la unidad penal lograron de algún modo, y a pesar de sufrir numerosas bajas, irrumpir en el formidable crucero. Escalaron por huecos de elevadores, emplearon sus bayonetas y aplicaron sus escasos conocimientos sobre las sagradas tecnologías. Finalmente lograron eliminar a los herejes que operaban los macrocañones. Entonces los grupos de asalto pudieron abordar el crucero y neutralizar a los restantes sectarios. La nave había sido conquistada.

languages.text: Seule une centaine d'entre eux s'en sont sortis, ce jour-là. L'Empereur s'est montré sévère avec ceux qui lui avaient tourné le dos. Cependant, bien des soldats pourtant aguerris pourraient prendre exemple sur leur ferveur. Couverts d'huile, de sang et de suie, le regard empreint d'une ardeur désespérée, les combattants de l'unité pénale ont réussi à atteindre le puissant croiseur en dépit de leurs pertes. Ils ont grimpé par les conduits, rougi leurs baïonnettes et mis à profit les quelques connaissances qu'ils détenaient en matière de technologie sacrée. Enfin, ils ont éliminé les hérétiques qui utilisaient les macro-canons. Des escouades de prévôts ont alors pu se poser sur le croiseur et abattre les derniers cultistes à bord. Le croiseur était à nous.
languages.original_text: No more than a hundred of them were left alive that day. The Emperor was harsh on those who had turned against Him. But many a seasoned soldier could have learned from their fervour. Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. They climbed shafts, used their bayonets, and applied what scant knowledge they had of sacred technology. Eventually, they destroyed the heretics operating the macro-cannons. Enforcer strike groups were then able to land on the cruiser and clean up the remaining cultists. The cruiser was conquered.

traits.locale_text: Seule une centaine d'entre eux s'en sont sortis, ce jour-là. L'Empereur s'est montré sévère avec ceux qui s'étaient égarés. Cependant, bien des soldats pourtant aguerris pourraient prendre exemple sur leur ferveur. Couverts d'huile, de sang et de suie, le regard empreint d'une ardeur désespérée, les combattants de l'unité pénale ont réussi à atteindre le puissant croiseur en dépit de leurs pertes. Ils ont grimpé par les conduits, rougi leurs baïonnettes et mis à profit les quelques connaissances qu'ils détenaient en matière de technologie sacrée. Enfin, ils ont éliminé les hérétiques qui utilisaient les macro-canons. Des escouades de prévôts ont alors pu se poser sur le croiseur et abattre les derniers cultistes à bord. Le croiseur était à nous.

languages.text: その日、生きていたのは100人もいなかった。皇帝は裏切り者たちに厳しかった。しかし、多くの熟練兵は彼らの熱意から学ぶことがあった。油と血と煤にまみれ、その目は過激な熱意に満ちていたが、流刑部隊の兵士たちは、犠牲者を出しながらも、どうにかして強大な巡洋艦を突破した。彼らはシャフトを登り、銃剣を使い、神聖な技術に関するわずかな知識を応用した。最終的に、彼らはマクロキャノンを操作していた異端者を破壊した。その後、エンフォーサーの攻撃隊がクルーザーに上陸し、残った魔女団を掃討した。クルーザーは征服された。
languages.original_text: No more than a hundred of them were left alive that day. The Emperor was harsh on those who had turned against Him. But many a seasoned soldier could have learned from their fervour. Covered in oil, blood, and soot, their eyes full of desperate zeal, the penal unit's fighters somehow managed, despite their losses, to break through to the mighty cruiser. They climbed shafts, used their bayonets, and applied what scant knowledge they had of sacred technology. Eventually, they destroyed the heretics operating the macro-cannons. Enforcer strike groups were then able to land on the cruiser and clean up the remaining cultists. The cruiser was conquered.

traits.locale_text: その日、生きていたのは100人もいなかった。皇帝は過ちを犯した者たちに厳しかった。しかし、多くの熟練兵は彼らの熱意から学ぶことがあった。油と血と煤にまみれ、その目は過激な熱意に満ちていたが、流刑部隊の兵士たちは、犠牲者を出しながらも、どうにかして強大な巡洋艦を突破した。彼らはシャフトを登り、銃剣を使い、神聖な技術に関するわずかな知識を応用した。最終的に、彼らはマクロキャノンを操作していた異端者を破壊した。その後、エンフォーサーの攻撃隊がクルーザーに上陸し、残った魔女団を掃討した。クルーザーは征服された。
